meaningMnemonic: Something that's both <kanji>fat</kanji> and <kanji>obese</kanji> has even more <vocabulary>fat</vocabulary> on it than you first thought. Like the <vocabulary>blubber</vocabulary> on a really big whale.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
